pastInspirations.q: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
pastInspirations.h:
“A day without laughter is a day wasted.” —
Charlie Chaplin

pastInspirations.q: As long as a human being worries about when he will die, and what he has that is his, all of his works are zero.
pastInspirations.h:
“As long as a human being worries about when he will die, and what he has that is his, all of his works are zero.” —
Kabir

pastInspirations.q: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.
pastInspirations.h:
“He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

pastInspirations.q: It's very important to like the people you work with, otherwise life and your job is gonna be quite miserable.
pastInspirations.h:
“It's very important to like the people you work with, otherwise life and your job is gonna be quite miserable.” —
Elon Musk

pastInspirations.q: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.
pastInspirations.h:
“An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.” —
Laurence J. Peter

pastInspirations.q: The quality of your commitments will determine the course of your life.
pastInspirations.h:
“The quality of your commitments will determine the course of your life.” —
Ralph Marston

pastInspirations.q: Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.
pastInspirations.h:
“Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.” —
Bob Marley

pastInspirations.q: We will act consistently with our view of who we truly are, whether that view is accurate or not.
pastInspirations.h:
“We will act consistently with our view of who we truly are, whether that view is accurate or not.” —
Tony Robbins

pastInspirations.q: Happiness is an effect of doing what you love, not an end goal to be achieved.
pastInspirations.h:
“Happiness is an effect of doing what you love, not an end goal to be achieved.” —
Celestine Chua

pastInspirations.q: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
pastInspirations.h:
“To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all. ” —
Oscar Wilde

pastInspirations.q: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
pastInspirations.h:
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift

pastInspirations.q: Life may be full of pain but that's not an excuse to give up.
pastInspirations.h:
“Life may be full of pain but that's not an excuse to give up.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

pastInspirations.q: What would you do if you weren't afraid?
pastInspirations.h:
“What would you do if you weren't afraid?” —
Spencer Johnson

pastInspirations.q: Life has the name of life, but in reality it is death.
pastInspirations.h:
“Life has the name of life, but in reality it is death.” —
Heraclitus

pastInspirations.q: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
pastInspirations.h:
“Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice. ” —
Henry Ford

pastInspirations.q: Remember where you came from, where you're going, and why you created this mess you got yourself into in the first place.
pastInspirations.h:
“Remember where you came from, where you're going, and why you created this mess you got yourself into in the first place.” —
Richard Bach

pastInspirations.q: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
pastInspirations.h:
“Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.” —
Albert Einstein

pastInspirations.q: It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.
pastInspirations.h:
“It is children only who enjoy the present; their elders either live on the memory of the past or the hope of the future.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

inspirationOfDay.q: Either get busy living or get busy dying.
inspirationOfDay.h:
“Either get busy living or get busy dying.” —
Stephen King
